Headline: Yellow Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Yellow Line continues to be temporarily suspended following an incident at Howard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Yellow Line continues to be temporarily suspended following a recent incident at Howard.

Shuttle bus service is available between Howard and Skokie/Dempster, serving all affected stations during normal hours of operation.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include the #97 Skokie bus route.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #87 87th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 88th/Buffalo
ShortDescription: Eastbound 87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Houston, 92nd, Baltimore and 91st: due to, street blockage near 88th/Buffalo.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Houston, 92nd, Baltimore and 91st: due to, street blockage near 88th/Buffalo.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Southbound Reroute near Milwaukee/Division
ShortDescription: Southbound 56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Ashland, Augusta and Milwaukee: due to, street blockage near Milwaukee/Division.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Ashland, Augusta and Milwaukee: due to, street blockage near Milwaukee/Division.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Harelm-bound Green Line Service Delayed at Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: Harelm-bound Green Line trains are standing at Cottage Grove due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harelm-bound Green Line trains are standing at Cottage Grove due to police activity. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Cottage Grove. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Cottage Grove.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
